sentence: Even further afield, Madison Gesiotto Gilbert, an attorney and past Miss Ohio USA who co-chaired a Women for Trump group in 2020, is campaigning for the seat.
title: House Democrats are retiring in droves. Not Ohio's Marcy Kaptur.

sentence: A staunch Trump supporter, Madison Gesiotto Gilbert is running for election to the U.S. House to represent Ohio’s 9th Congressional District.
author: Ben Armstrong
title: Madison G. Gilbert: Fed Up with Incompetence in Washington

sentence: The former president is set to headline a rally in Delaware, Ohio, this weekend featuring Mr. Vance and other candidates he has endorsed: Rep. Mike Carey, Max Miller and Madison Gesiotto Gilbert.
author: Seth McLaughlin
title: Original ‘Trumpers’ urge ex-president to rescind Vance endorsement in Ohio Senate race
